# Raspberry Pi Zero 2W - 64-bit headless configuration
# Kernel
kernel=Image

# Disable overscan (no display)
disable_overscan=1

[pi02]
# Moderate overclock
arm_freq=1300
over_voltage=4
core_freq=500

[all]
# GPU Memory - 16MB minimum for headless
gpu_mem=16

# UART for serial console
dtoverlay=miniuart-bt
enable_uart=1

# Enable 64-bit mode
arm_64bit=1
